infos.title: Priestess of Light
infos.story: An apprentice priestess serving the Goddess Lua, the church has high expectations of her as a future priestess. From the early years of her training, she has amazed even the high priests with her strong faith and natural talent for channeling Lua's power. She herself considers priesthood her destined path, and her kind heart reflects her resolve. However, she shows no mercy toward evildoers.
infos.story_: An apprentice priestess serving the Goddess Lua, the church has high expectations of her as a future priestess. From the early years of her training, she has amazed even the high priests with her strong faith and natural talent for channeling Lua's power. She herself considers priesthood her destined path, and her kind heart reflects her resolve. However, she shows no mercy toward evildoers.

1.name: Miraculous Light
1.description: Dispels negative effects from the ally with the lowest HP, healing HP of the target by ??? and HP of allies nearby equal to 40% of Heal Rate.

2.name: Blessings of Light
2.description: Casts a shield on all allies that absorbs ??? DMG for 12 sec. While the shield is in effect, the target increases its ATK by 20%, Heal Rate by 50% and gains immunity to CC.

3.name: Heaven's Vengeance
3.description: Attacks the target and its nearby enemies 6 times, dealing up to ??? M.DMG. 500 additional Crit Chance applies to this Skill. Hit targets will be blinded for 6 sec, and take 25% increased All DMG for 10 sec.

4.name: Goddess Grace
4.description: Reduces All DMG taken by 15%. At the beginning of each battle, and every 15 sec, increases M.DEF of 1 ally with the lowest HP by ??? for 10 sec and heals HP of the target by 15% for the duration of Skill.

light.effect: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, the skill targets 2 allies.

dark.effect: Healed allies take 25% reduced M.DMG for 10 sec.

light.effect: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, DMG is increased by 80%.

dark.effect: Changes the target to random enemies.

light.effect: Reduces DMG the target takes from Non-Hero enemies by 30% for the duration of Skill.

dark.effect: Increases ATK of all allies by 5% of own ATK.

uw.name: God's Authority, Rosmerta
uw.description: Every 8 sec, heals 4 allies with the lowest HP by (0) of own ATK, and increases Crit Chance by 300 and Crit DMG by (1) for the ally with the highest ATK for 8 sec.
uw.story: The Angels are said to be closer to Lua than any other race. When a high ranking angel dies, the remaining core is transferred to the haven of angels for resurrection. However, one such angel, Rosmerta, bestowed her core to the Church of Lua. This holy staff has been created from the core's divine energy.

1.name: Angel's Egg
1.description: [Miraculous Light] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and target becomes Immune to DMG for (0) sec.
1.story: The treasure that Frey loves dearly. It is a crystal orb that Frey had when she was found as an infant under the World Tree. Frey named it Angel's Egg for its luster like angel's hair, and she's cherished it her entire life.

2.name: Miraculous Medal
2.description: [Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers (0) Mana every second for 4 sec.
2.story: Medal made by the saintess of miracles, Yvonne, with the revelation of the goddess. The Medal of Miracles is a sacred artifact that contains the magic of light. It is said that saintess Yvonne saved the city that was invaded by the demons with the blessing of light that was boosted with this medal.

3.name: Forgotten Arbiter's Feather
3.description: [Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by (0) sec.
3.story: Feather from the Guardian of the Sun. Feather of an Angel who saved the people by fighting against the Demons in the past. He left his feather as proof of his promise to return once again if the world falls into chaos. An artifact of the Church of Lua that summons holy rays of the sun to blind the enemy.

4.name: Angelic Advent
4.description: [Goddess Grace] Upon activation, dispels all negative effects from the target and increases the target's Heal Rate by (0) for the duration of skill.
4.story: An old storybook owned by Frey. It was the first storybook ever given to young Frey as a present, and it tells of a war between the Angels and Demons. Frey particularly likes the part where the Angels emerge victorious after defeating all the Demons.

sw.requirement: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
sw.description: Summons the soul of God's Authority, Rosmerta for 12 seconds, healing HP of an ally with the lowest HP by ??? every sec. Additionally, attacks the enemy with the highest ATK and enemies nearby it every sec, dealing ??? M.DMG and inflicting stun for 1 sec.

advancement.1: Duration of the soul is changed to 15 sec.
advancement.2: Increases Heal Rate by 50%, and the healed target blocks all incoming attacks for 5 sec.

sw.story:
Rosmerta, an angel who loved mankind so much, to the point where she would entrust them with her own core. Although her power was weaker than that of Lua, her will to protect the ones she love was as strong as that of Goddess Lua.
'Even if the goddess would abandon the humans, I will never stop protecting them. Even if that lead to the denial of my existence...'
As Frey's prayer accumulated, Rosmerta's will spread her wings and flew, as if it intended to break the silence.
The light resembled Lua yet different, but was as gentle and accommodating as the goddess.

As long as Frey prays for love, Rosmerta will always heed her calls and rain down her blessing upon Frey and the ones she loves.
